class aioftp.Client(create_connection=None)¶

Bases: aioftp.client.BaseClient

FTP client.

class aioftp.StatusCodeError(expected_codes, received_code, info)¶

Raised for unexpected or “bad” status codes.

Parameters:
  • expected_codes (tuple) – tuple of expected codes
  • received_codes (tuple) – tuple of received codes
  • info (list) – list of lines with server response
